title: Hydroponic Vertical Farming: Maximize Space & Yields!

subtasks: Understanding vertical farming concepts (hydroponics, space efficiency)
Researching different vertical hydroponic systems (tower, A-frame, wall-mounted, NFT)
Selecting appropriate crops for vertical farming (leafy greens, herbs, microgreens, compact fruits)
Building a vertical hydroponic system (choosing components, assembling, installing grow lights, planting)
Managing a vertical farm (monitoring light, water, nutrients, adjusting as needed)
Troubleshooting common issues (nutrient imbalances, algae, power outages, pests)
Exploring future trends in vertical farming (automation, AI, hyper-local production)
